ErrorCode.name: AlreadyInAutomatic
ErrorCode.description: Trying to set automatic mode, failed. It has already been set

ErrorCode.name: PositionOutOfLimits
ErrorCode.description: Command tries to move the telescope out of limits

ErrorCode.name: InvalidProposalStatusTransition
ErrorCode.description: Trying to set an invalid status for the proposa.

ErrorCode.name: ImageAlreadyStored
ErrorCode.description: Image has already been stored in the database.

ErrorCode.name: CameraIsOff
ErrorCode.description: Trying to take exposure with camera off.

ErrorCode.name: SchedulerAlreadyRunning
ErrorCode.description: Trying to start scheduler, but is already has been started.

ErrorCode.name: SchedulerAlreadyStopped
ErrorCode.description: Trying to stop scheduler, but is already has been stopped.

ErrorCode.name: NoProposalExecuting
ErrorCode.description: Trying to retrieve an executing proposal, but no proposal is executing.

ErrorCode.name: SystemInAutoMode
ErrorCode.description: Trying to execute a command in console while the system is in automatic mode.
